description: Describes Amazon GuardDuty findings specified by finding IDs.

parameters.name: DetectorId
parameters.description: The ID of the detector that specifies the GuardDuty service whose findings you want to retrieve. To find the detectorId in the current Region, see the Settings page in the GuardDuty console, or run the ListDetectors API.

parameters.name: FindingIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the findings that you want to retrieve. (string) ---

parameters.name: SortCriteria
parameters.description: Represents the criteria used for sorting findings. AttributeName (string) --- Represents the finding attribute, such as accountId, that sorts the findings. OrderBy (string) --- The order by which the sorted findings are to be displayed.

nested_params.name: AttributeName
nested_params.description: Represents the finding attribute, such as accountId, that sorts the findings.

nested_params.name: OrderBy
nested_params.description: The order by which the sorted findings are to be displayed.
